## padZero() function

补零操作

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function padZero(num: number | string, targetLength?: number): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  num | number \| string | 数字或字符串 |
|  targetLength | number | _(Optional)_ 补零后的长度 |
